description: Governs the agent's ability to initiate and execute self-generated, exploratory tasks during idle periods.

rules.description: The agent may only initiate a speculative task when idle.
rules.enforcement: The agent's main control loop must verify an idle state before allowing invocation of a speculative plan.

rules.description: A speculative task must begin with a formal proposal document.
rules.enforcement: The initial plan for any speculative task must include a step to generate and save a proposal artifact.

rules.description: Speculative tasks must operate under defined resource limits.
rules.enforcement: A system-level constraint that the agent orchestrator must enforce.

rules.description: Final artifacts from a speculative task must be submitted for user review.
rules.enforcement: The agent is forbidden from using 'submit' or 'merge' in a speculative context and must use 'request_user_input'.

rules.description: All logs and artifacts from a speculative task must be tagged as 'speculative'.
rules.enforcement: Logging and file-creation tools should be context-aware and apply this tag in speculative mode.
